insert into eb_store_product (id, mer_id, origin_id, image, store_name, store_info, keyword, cate_id, price, vip_price, ot_price, postage, unit_name, sort, sales, stock, sale_from, sale_to, is_show, is_hot, is_benefit, is_best, is_new, add_time, is_postage, is_del, mer_use, give_integral, source_cost, cost, is_seckill, is_bargain, ficti, browse, code_path, store_code, soure_link, brand, ctime, goodsid_xdj, last_update_xdj, slider_image, ori_level_prices, level_prices, description, forbbiden_area ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{postage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{saleTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isBenefit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isBest,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isPostage,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{merUse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{giveIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourceCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isSeckill,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isBargain,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ficti,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soureLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsidXdj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateXdj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sliderImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{oriLevelPrices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{levelPrices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{forbbidenArea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update eb_store_product set mer_id = #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_info = #{storeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vip_price = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ot_price = #{otPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, postage = #{postage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_from = #{saleFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sale_to = #{saleTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, is_benefit = #{isBenefit,jdbcType=BIT}, is_best = #{isBest,jdbcType=BIT}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_postage = #{isPostage,jdbcType=BIT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, mer_use = #{merUse,jdbcType=BIT}, give_integral = #{giveIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, source_cost = #{sourceCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_seckill = #{isSeckill,jdbcType=BIT}, is_bargain = #{isBargain,jdbcType=BIT}, ficti = #{ficti,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse = #{browse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code_path = #{codePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, soure_link = #{soureLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goodsid_xdj = #{goodsidXdj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_update_xdj = #{lastUpdateXdj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, slider_image = #{sliderImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ori_level_prices = #{oriLevelPrices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, level_prices = #{levelPrices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, forbbiden_area = #{forbbidenArea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
